scripts.cypress:run:docker: HOST_UID=$(id -u) HOST_GID=$(id -g) docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.e2e.yml up --build --abort-on-container-exit --exit-code-from e2e e2e
scripts.cypress:booking-export:docker: HOST_UID=$(id -u) HOST_GID=$(id -g) CYPRESS_SPEC=cypress/e2e/booking-export.cy.js docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.e2e.yml up --build --abort-on-container-exit --exit-code-from e2e e2e
scripts.cypress:docker:down: HOST_UID=$(id -u) HOST_GID=$(id -g) docker compose -f docker-compose.yml -f docker-compose.e2e.yml down -v
scripts.coverage:e2e:run: npm run coverage:e2e:clean && npm run coverage:e2e:prepare && CYPRESS_COVERAGE=true cypress run && npm run coverage:e2e:report
